thread.title: Demi Lovato is nude, make-up free and un-retouched for stunning Vanity Fair shoot - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato is nude, make-up free and un-retouched for stunning Vanity Fair shoot - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Demi Lovato is nude, make-up free and un-retouched for stunning Vanity Fair shoot - Showbiz
text: Demi Lovato has posed nude and make-up free for Vanity Fair.She also insisted the photographs, which can be viewed here, had no retouching done in a bid to show she is comfortable in her own skin after years of struggling with severe eating disorders.The actress and singer lost her great-grandfather the day before the photos were taken and arrived at the venue with the idea, telling photographer Patrick Ecclesine that life is too short and she wanted to do the shoot straight away."When I think of confidence, I think of a lot of things but one of them is feeling comfortable in your own skin," said Lovato."I thought there was something incredible about the idea of no make-up whatsoever, no clothes and no retouching. Real is beautiful, and @ddlovato's daring photo shoot proves it #realdemi http://t.co/OD5ETu7ZFJ pic.twitter.com/V5nGEukRz2â€” VANITY FAIR (@VanityFair) October 2, 2015"You know, that says something. I never thought I would have ever gotten to a place in my life where I could feel comfortable doing that."Lovato has received widespread support from fans and fellow celebrities on social media. Ashley Tisdale wrote: "I think [Demi] is an extremely beautiful person inside and out. That is all," while ex-Girls Aloud singer Sarah Harding added: "#WeAreProudOfYouDemi we were born that way..so why not own it?! Being comfortable in one owns skin is not easy 4most."Lovato's fifth studio album Confident is out on October 16. Watch her music video for 'Cool For the Summer' below:
